comments.body: We temporary don't use from pypi, since there are missing files in the source distribution, see https://github.com/nion-software/nionui/pull/26.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  #url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  #sha256: 85c4a64e6a30be2b601f05680e809712589c6dbb561426d4d5e0f35ef5f97e54
  url: "https://github.com/nion-software/nionui/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  sha256: 5ac5f41d6a611807158d707d1b7001ab25f77036af0ca7cfec02e6694c379451

@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@  #Use pypi for the next release, source distribution missing files
  #url: "https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz"
  #sha256: 85c4a64e6a30be2b601f05680e809712589c6dbb561426d4d5e0f35ef5f97e54
